title: Calculate a Statute of Limitations
description: For a new personal injury case, a paralegal must calculate the statute of limitations to determine the deadline for filing a lawsuit.

tasks.description: Identify the date the injury occurred and the jurisdiction (state).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the key facts needed for the calculation.

tasks.description: Research the statute of limitations for personal injury claims in that specific state.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the statute of limitations is two years.

tasks.description: Calculate the exact deadline by adding the statutory period to the date of injury.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the final date by which a complaint must be filed.

tasks.description: Enter the deadline into the case management and calendar systems with multiple reminders.
